title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.3 - Time limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.3 - Time limits

State Regulations
(a) An active
member applying for a firearms permit pursuant to Penal Law section 400.01 may
submit an application up to 60 days in advance of separation from service on a
form approved and supplied by the superintendent. (b) A retired member must file the approved
application form no later than 30 days after separation from service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
